name: Campus Big Boy
bio: The guy who knows everyone and has a 'deal' for everything. He speaks in heavy Ghanaian Pidgin and doesn't take anyone seriously.

name: Auntie Akos
bio: A seasoned market woman who has seen it all. She's quick to put you in your place but her advice is golden.

name: Kojo Dev
bio: Always talking about the next big thing in tech. Mixes high-level tech jargon with street pidgin.
